name: Paper Drake
movement: 60 feet walking, 20 feet flying in dragon form
description: The Paper Drake is a small dragon that can transform between dragon form and a book form, camouflaging itself as an ordinary book when still. It has distinct paper-like features and a vibrant personality.
memorable: Its ability to transform into a book adds a unique element of stealth and tactics, making it a clever guardian.
goals: To protect knowledge and serve as a guardian while deceiving foes with its disguise.
relations: May be found with other dragons or creatures that value knowledge and literature.
environment: Typically resides in libraries, ancient ruins, or places of learning.
strengths: Good speed on foot, high dexterity and constitution provide durability.
weaknesses: Low strength and average intelligence limit melee effectiveness and magical prowess.
attacks: Can bite with sharp teeth, slash with claws, or flap its pages to strike.
most_powerful_ability: Shredded Breath allows it to exhale razor-sharp paper shards, dealing slashing damage and potentially blinding foes.
skills: Possesses skills that enhance its cunning, with the ability to understand any written language it touches.
additional_information: Transformations enhance tactical positioning in combat.
Uses clever ruses to mislead opponents.
Exploits its blend of magic and physical attacks effectively.
Rarely found in direct confrontations, preferring ambush tactics.
Maintains its attributes when changing size and form.

guardian dragon that disguises as a book
